code: import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const ShowTask=_ref=>{let{tasklist,setTasklist,task,setTask}=_ref;const handleEdit=id=>{const selectedTask=tasklist.find(todo=>todo.id===id);setTask(selectedTask);};const handleDelete=id=>{const updateTaskList=tasklist.filter(todo=>todo.id!==id);setTasklist(updateTaskList);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"showTask",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"head",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title",children:"Todo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"count",children:tasklist.length})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setTasklist([]),className:"clearAll",children:"Clear All"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tasklist.map(todo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"name",children:todo.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"time",children:todo.time})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{onClick:()=>handleEdit(todo.id),className:"bi bi-pencil-square"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(todo.id),className:"bi bi-trash"})]},todo.id))})]});};
